data.text: @53kobasko Like why can’t he just represent himself why does he have to take responsibility for a whole race in this nation... because he’s famous doesn’t make him inhumane and he honest about his break downs his flaws

@53kobasko See that’s where everyone expects him to choose a side why can’t he be neutral and not see color at all but fight for his beliefs and business as soon as he married Kim people called him a sellout why because he loved a biracial woman that wasn’t black it’s dumb
